aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: A key that is present in the request the user makes to the ELB service

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Global tag key and value pair

aws:TagKeys.description: The list of all the tag key names associated with the resource in the request

elasticloadbalancing:ResourceTag/.description: The preface string for a tag key and value pair attached to a resource

elasticloadbalancing:ResourceTag/${TagKe.description: A tag key and value pair
